Managing Your Device

This chapter describes the administration features of your device, including user creation, network management, system diagnostics and logs, date and time, and other settings.

 • Setting Password Complexity

 • Configuring User Accounts

 • Setting the Session Timeout Value

 • Configuring Simple Network Management (SNMP)

 • Using Diagnostic Tools

 • Configuring Log and E-mail Settings

 • Configuring Bonjour

 • Configuring Date and Time Settings

 • Backing Up and Restoring the System

 • Upgrading Firmware or Changing the Language

 • Rebooting the Device

 • (Optional) To return to factory default settings, select Return to factory default settings after reboot and Click Reboot.
